content.new:
On Gazebo 9.5 on macOS Mojave 10.14.1

Deleting a model I've run into this error a few times.  Gazebo crashes and I get the following in the console:


```
#!gzserver(59512,0x700002045000) malloc: *** error for object 0x7fa0641d0500: pointer being freed was not allocated
gzserver(59512,0x700002045000) malloc: *** set a breakpoint in malloc_error_break to debug
```
content.old:

issue.title: Deleting model crashes gazebo with malloc error
